display_long_description:
**Test Your Courage in the Stalingrad Demo**

Step into the intense world of Days of Heroes: Stalingrad – Demo Edition, and experience the raw chaos of WWII combat in immersive VR.
Train, fight, and survive under relentless enemy assault in this exclusive free demo that showcases the heart of the full game.

**Survive the Battlefield**

Take your position in the training grounds and prepare for the ultimate test — a brutal survival mission where the enemy will stop at nothing.
Every second counts. Every shot matters. Will you hold the line or fall under the pressure of fire?

**🎯 Your training begins now. Can you survive the onslaught? 🎯**
[media]

**Discover the Full Game**

The demo gives you a taste of the massive Days of Heroes: Stalingrad experience — featuring two full campaigns (Soviet and German), tank missions, sabotage, and epic front-line battles.


[media]
**⚔️ Try it free. Master the chaos. Become a hero. ⚔️**
